name: dash0-sdk-web
description: Dash0's Web SDK to collect telemetry from end-users' web browsers

scripts.build: pnpm run build:clean && pnpm run build:typescript && pnpm run build:rollup
scripts.fileStats:
echo "
File Stats:" && ls dist/script/*.js | xargs -I '%' bash -c 'echo "%: $(./node_modules/.bin/gzip-size % --include-original) (gzip)"'

author: Dash0 Inc.
